instructions.sl.utf8: Pazljivo preberite vsako izjavo. Če se z izjavo strinjate, obkljukajte ustrezno polje.
instructions.en.utf8: Read each statement carefully. If you agree with the statement, than tick the appropriate checkbox.

question.sl.utf8: S posameznimi frazami, besedami in gibi znam navezati stik z ljudmi.
question.en.utf8: I can contact people by using simple phrases, words and gestures.

question.sl.utf8: Znam povedati, da razumem ali da ne razumem.
question.en.utf8: I can say when I don't understand.

question.sl.utf8: S preprostimi besedami znam zaprositi, naj sogovornik ponovi povedano.
question.en.utf8: I can very simply ask somebody to repeat what they said.

question.sl.utf8: S preprostimi besedami znam zaprositi, naj sogovornik govori počasneje.
question.en.utf8: I can very simply ask somebody to speak more slowly.

question.sl.utf8: S frazami znam vzpostaviti stik z ljudmi oziroma jih nagovoriti.
question.en.utf8: I can ask for attention.

question.sl.utf8: Znam pokazati, da sledim pogovoru.
question.en.utf8: I can indicate when I am following what someone is saying.

question.sl.utf8: Kadar česa ne razumem, znam govorca na preprost način prositi, naj ponovi povedano.
question.en.utf8: When I don't understand something, I can very simply ask the speaker to repeat what they said.

question.sl.utf8: Ko ne najdem pravih besed, si znam pomagati z drugimi izrazi.
question.en.utf8: When I cannot find the right words I can help myself with other expressions.

question.sl.utf8: Ob pomoči slovarja in drugih pripomočkov znam rešiti enostavnejše pisne in ustne naloge.
question.en.utf8: With the help of the dictionary and other aids I can manage simple written and oral tasks.

question.sl.utf8: Znam potrditi del sogovornikovega besedila in s tem nakazati, da se razumeva.
question.en.utf8: I can repeat part of what someone has said to confirm that we understand each other.

question.sl.utf8: Znam prositi sogovornika, naj mi dodatno pojasni pravkar povedano.
question.en.utf8: I can ask someone to clarify or elaborate what they have just said.

question.sl.utf8: Kadar se ne morem spomniti določenega izraza, znam uporabiti preprosto besedo s podobnim pomenom in sogovornika prositi, da me popravi.
question.en.utf8: When I can't think of the word I want, I can use a simple word meaning something similar and invite »correction«.

question.sl.utf8: Znam voditi pogovor, vendar potrebujem premore, da se pripravim na nadaljevanje stavka ali misli, zlasti pri daljšem prostem govoru.
question.en.utf8: I can lead the conversation, but I need breaks to prepare for continuing the sentence or the thought, particularly in longer speaking.

question.sl.utf8: Znam uporabljati pripomočke, da razumem napisano ali da sam sestavim besedilo.
question.en.utf8: I can use help so that I can understand the text or to draft the text by myself.

question.sl.utf8: Znam uporabljati standardne besedne zveze kot npr. »na to vprašanje je težko odgovoriti«, da pridobim čas za oblikovanje nadaljnjega besedila ali da obdržim besedo.
question.en.utf8: I can use standard phrases like »That's a difficult question to answer« to gain time and keep the turn while formulating what to say.

question.sl.utf8: Zavedam se svojih poglavitnih napak in se jim med govorom zavestno izogibam.
question.en.utf8: I can make a note of »favourite mistakes« and consciously monitor speech for them.

question.sl.utf8: Napake, ki jih opazim, ali tiste, ki so vodile v nesporazum, popravim po navadi kar sam.
question.en.utf8: I can generally correct slips and errors if I become conscious of them or if they have led to misunderstandings.

question.sl.utf8: Tekoče obvladam številne izraze, ob pomoči katerih lahko oblikujem pripombe na že povedano, pa tudi tiste izraze, s katerimi pridobim nekaj časa za razmislek, da lahko nemoteno nadaljujem pogovor.
question.en.utf8: I can use fluently a variety of appropriate expressions to preface my remarks in order to get the floor, or to gain time and keep the floor while thinking.

question.sl.utf8: Svoje prispevke znam spretno prilagoditi prispevkom drugih.
question.en.utf8: I can relate my own contributions skilfully to those of other speakers.

question.sl.utf8: Izraz, ki se ga trenutno ne morem domisliti, lahko nadomestim s pomensko ustreznim izrazom.
question.en.utf8: I can substitute an equivalent term for a word I can't recall without distracting the listener.

question.sl.utf8: Samostojno znam pridobiti informacijo in jezikovno rešitev iz različnih virov, jih analizirati, obdelati in uporabiti v svoj namen.
question.en.utf8: Independently I can get information and language solutions from various sources, analyse them, work them out and use them purposefully.

question.sl.utf8: Če pri sporazumevanju naletim na kakšno jezikovno težavo, se ji znam spretno izogniti in težavno mesto tako preoblikovati, da sogovorniki tega niti ne opazijo.
question.en.utf8: I can backtrack and restructure around a difficulty so smoothly the interlocutor is hardly aware of it.
